response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "Young adults are generally at a higher risk for recidivism due to developmental factors and social influences."),
    ("gender", "low", "Male gender is less predictive of recidivism compared to other factors."),
    ("ethnicity", "low", "Hispanic ethnicity does not strongly correlate with recidivism in isolation."),
    ("prior_arrests", "medium", "One arrest without conviction suggests some involvement with the criminal justice system, which can be a risk factor."),
    ("height_and_weight", "low", "Physical characteristics do not directly influence recidivism."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "Marital status is generally not a strong predictor of recidivism."),
    ("living_alone", "medium", "Living situation can impact social support and stability, affecting recidivism risk."),
    ("education_level", "medium", "High school diploma without college education may correlate with lower employment opportunities and higher risk."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "Having held one job in the past year is generally considered a positive factor."),
    ("drug_use", "medium", "Past drug use, even if not recent, can indicate vulnerability to substance-related offenses."),
    ("depression_symptoms", "high", "Significant depressive symptoms can indicate mental health issues that may lead to criminal behavior."),
    ("family_history", "medium", "Growing up in a household of size 3 and an urban area can suggest varied influences on behavior."),
    ("religious_beliefs", "low", "Lack of belief in divine influence does not directly impact recidivism risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 65
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 11 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
